# detect_binod

This package will detect binod word in image file.

## Installation

Run the following to install:

```python
pip install detect-binod
```

## Usage

```python
import detect_binod

# To detect Binod
detect_binod.detect(args.image)
```

```python
# To run example
python test_detect_binod.py -i <image_file>
```
